text: The 2019 Hwaebul Cup was the seventh edition of the Hwaebul Cup (홰불, Torch) celebrating North Korea's Youth Day. Ryŏmyŏng were the defending champions. ==Group stage== The 12 teams were divided into two groups. The group winners and runners-up advanced to the semi-finals. In Group A, Ryŏmyŏng finished first with five wins and one draw, and Amrokkang finished second with three wins, one draw and two defeats. In Group B, P'yŏngyang City finished first with four wins and one draw, and Hwaebul finished second with three wins, one draw and one defeat. ==Knockout stage== ===Semi-finals=== ===Third place match=== ===Final=== ==See also== *2018–19 DPR Korea Premier Football League ==References== Category:DPR Korea Football League seasons Category:Hwaebul Cup Cup Singapore
title: 2019 Hwaebul Cup
